extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2023-27350 or CVE-2023-27351 by verifying the installed version of PaperCut MF or NG.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2023-27350 or CVE-2023-27351?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade PaperCut MF or NG
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade to PaperCut MF and PaperCut NG versions 20.1.7, 21.2.11, or 22.0.9 and later to address the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Application Log for Suspicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Look for suspicious activity in 'Logs' > 'Application Log' within the PaperCut admin interface, especially updates from a user called '[setup wizard]'.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for New Suspicious Users
extracted_playbook.description: Look for new (suspicious) users being created or other configuration keys being tampered with.

extracted_playbook.title: Check Debug Mode Logs for SetupCompleted
extracted_playbook.description: If the Application Server logs are in debug mode, check for lines mentioning 'SetupCompleted' at times not correlating with server installation or upgrade.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Server Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Find server logs in '[app-path]/server/logs/*.*', where 'server.log' is normally the most recent log file.

affected_products: PaperCut MF or NG version 8.0 or later
PaperCut MF or NG version 15.0 or later
